features.name: Hero Section
features.description: Main landing section with animated backgrounds, floating orbs, headline, CTA buttons, stats display, and scroll indicator. Uses Framer Motion for animations.

features.name: Floating Navigation
features.description: Sticky navigation bar with scroll detection, mobile menu, smooth scroll to sections, and glass morphism design.

features.name: Countdown Section
features.description: Event countdown timer with real-time updates, animated cards for days/hours/minutes/seconds, and call-to-action.

features.name: Features Section
features.description: Showcase of 6 key features with icons, hover effects, glass card design, and CTA section. Displays security, VIP access, avatar creation, platform benefits, community, and possibilities.

features.name: Social Proof Section
features.description: Testimonials section with user reviews, ratings, avatars, and trust indicators in glass card layout.

features.name: IID Creation Section
features.description: Multi-step form for I-ID registration with progress indicators, form validation, avatar customization steps, and feature highlights.

features.name: Final CTA Section
features.description: Urgency-driven call-to-action with scarcity indicators, money-back guarantee, social proof numbers, and scroll-to-form button.

features.name: Glass UI Components
features.description: Reusable glass morphism components including GlassButton, GlassCard, and NeonText with variants and animations.

features.name: Background Boxes
features.description: Animated grid background effect with moving boxes for visual depth.

features.name: Particle Background
features.description: Animated particle system that creates floating particles across the screen with physics-based movement.

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Helper functions including className merging (cn), event date calculations, and countdown time calculations.

features.name: Root Layout
features.description: Main layout wrapper with global styles, font loading (Doto, Space Grotesk), particle background, and metadata configuration.

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Main landing page orchestrating all sections in order: Hero, Features, Social Proof, Countdown, Final CTA, IID Form, and Footer.

features.name: Global Styles
features.description: Custom CSS with animations, gradients, glass effects, grid backgrounds, and utility classes for the futuristic design system.

features.name: Tailwind Configuration
features.description: Custom Tailwind theme with extended colors, fonts (Doto, Space Grotesk), animations, and design tokens.
